definition[0]: the act of writing your name at the end of a document to show that you agree with it
example[0]: The formal signing will take place on April 9th.
example[1]: the signing of the ceasefire agreement
definition[1]: someone who has just signed a contract to join a sports team or work with a record company
example[2]: New signing, Mark Brown, scored three goals in his first match.
definition[2]: when a sports team or record company prepares a contract which someone then signs to say that they will join the team or work with the company
example[3]: Birmingham City have completed the signing of Doug Bell from Shrewsbury Town.
definition[3]: the use of sign language to communicate to or between people who cannot hear well
